meanings.definition: Raunchiest: most vulgar or sexually explicit
meanings.sent1: The raunchiest movie I've ever seen had so many inappropriate scenes.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's raunchiest jokes always made the audience blush.
meanings.sent3: The party had a raunchiest theme, but it was all in good fun.
meanings.sent4: Her choice of words was the raunchiest I've heard in a long time.
meanings.sent5: The raunchiest lyrics in the song made everyone gasp in surprise.

meanings.definition: Raunchiest: most tastelessly showy or vulgar
meanings.sent1: The raunchiest outfit at the party was covered in glitter and feathers.
meanings.sent2: The reality TV show featured the raunchiest contestants competing for attention.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated in the raunchiest way possible, with neon colors and sparkles.
meanings.sent4: Her behavior at the event was the raunchiest display of extravagance.
meanings.sent5: The raunchiest car in the showroom had gold rims and a leopard-print interior.
